reviews.text: Finally, a nice safe, clean and high end hotel in the area! Great staff, great location and a great value. Will stay here again!
reviews.title: Best in Corpus

reviews.text: Waitstaff friendly
reviews.title: Great location, fabulous ocean view!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Decent food, centrally located. The bay view room allowed an open window
reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful!

reviews.text: Stayed at this hotel for business. It is located directly accross the street from Corpus Christi Bay, with great views of the causeway, which is colorfully lit at night, as well as the USS Lexington. The hotel is clean and well kept. The hotel has a fabulous restaurant and bar at the top, around the 21st floor, with spectacular views of the ocean and surrounding area, day or night. While the waterfront is a lot different than the beaches at nearby Port Aransas, this is a great hotel to stay at if you just want to get away and have a relaxing stay with great views.
reviews.title: Beautiful! Wonderful Guest Service!

reviews.text: My husband and I stayed here on August 6,2012 our way to South Padra,Tx. We not only fell in love with the beautiful city, the hotel was breath taking along with the best view ever, over looking the bay was something to behold. The room was so up to date with the latest style and very clean. The room service was good and on time,our waiter was very professional and nice as well, the food was also very tasty.The Hotel even sends out thank you emails for staying there and for your business,which we thought was a very tasteful touch. For this is our choice of Hotel when we come to Corpus Christi,Tx!
reviews.title: Above and Beyond!

reviews.text: -This is a nice above average hotel with a nice view
reviews.title: This is a nice above average hotel with a nice view

reviews.text: -Well run for this level of hotel
reviews.title: A great hotel

reviews.text: -My room had a nice view and was updated
reviews.title: Best Hotel Service Ever!!
Overall great, some misgivings
reviews.text: -If I was to come back to Corpus Christi I would stay here again
-Room service dinner was very nice especially for a room service meal
reviews.title: Excellent stay

reviews.text: Stayed at the Omni Bayfront Tower 2 weeks ago to attend a wedding. Great location - central to all things Corpus Christi. Front desk personnel were welcoming and friendly. The casual dining restaurant on the 2nd floor serves a super breakfast - it's pricey for sure, but very tasty and the table service was outstanding (thank you Anna!!). We didn't upgrade our room, so our view wasn't the greatest, but the room itself was clean and very comfortable. Love the fact that the sliding door was operable, so we could step onto the balcony in the morning to see sunrise and smell the gulf air. Highly recommend; will certainly stay here again.
reviews.title: Very nice experience.

reviews.text: Good: The hotel was beautiful, very clean and quiet.
reviews.title: nice downtown hotel

reviews.text: Bad: The guest room and bathroom were small. There was a charge for both Wi-Fi and parking.
reviews.title: Very nice and clean, great view

reviews.text: We had to go back and ask for the kid's goodie bags, as they were not offered at check-in for whatever reason.
reviews.title: We are nearly black members on select guest, but now having some reservations.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Attended a conference here and my entire experience was very nice. The lobby is nothing great but nice. The rooms are nice and roomy and I was able to view the bay along with the bridge which lights up at night and changes colors. If you go here with kids, they will love it. Heck, I enjoyed it. The small restaurant on the 2nd floor has very good food. I had a great hamburger and the bread/bun was awesome. I recommend that and an order of fries. Easy parking and overall, great experience.
reviews.title: Disaster at the Omni Corpus Christi Hotel Bayfront Tower

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is our first stay at this Omni and the view of the harbour bridge with colors was so romantic. Although we did not eat here, we did enjoy some music with a live band and cocktails. Rooms and staff were excellent. Although it's a little pricey, it is worth the rate and we will stay here again.
reviews.title: Beautiful View!

reviews.text: First stay in an Omni. Great service, view and friendliness of staff. Went there for a science teacher's convention. Our balcony overlooked the bay, the Lexington and a beautiful wind turbine farm. Room very clean. Ate breakfast and dinner 2 nights at the Glass Pavilion. The crab cakes were the best I've ever had - and I've had some great ones! Service at the lounge and restaurant was great. Free beverages delivered each morning, water and ice delivered at night. Had a problem with one of the keys - someone was there to check the lock within 10 minutes. Room was very clean and the housekeeper was friendly and eager to make sure everything was perfect. I am now a confirmed Omni fan!
reviews.title: Great Conference hotel

reviews.text: Fabulous view from our room...loved the rainbow colored bridge. Room was very clean..in fact one of the cleanest we've visited recently. Although we did not dine at the restaurant, we did enjoy cocktails there...great view of the bay.
reviews.title: Great location

reviews.text: We have stayed here before and enjoyed all our stays. The view from our room was great, overlooking the bay. The staff gave excellent service which is typical of Omni Hotels. There are many local. seafood restaurants nearby and many more a short drive away. Omni is expensive but there are usually disounts available online. Be sure to join their rewards club before booking as you get some perks the first visit with them.
reviews.title: Omni Corpus Christi

reviews.text: This hotel is accross from the water and just about all the rooms have some kind of view(I only know because we stayed with other friends) very clean but by no means new but would stay again even tho the rooms are small but up to expectations there is a stripes store with coofee and breakfast if you dont want a fancy sit down meal but not a whole lot close by so you have to drive for entertainment if you want,overall good especially we got off season prices but dont think id [pay full price.
reviews.title: nice
